kss_0.0.2.description:
# Features
* Three new options:
  * `the_great_cave_offensive_required_gold` sets the required amount of gold required to escape the Great Cave
  * `the_great_cave_offensive_excess_gold` sets how much of the excess gold should be kept in the multiworld (with 100 being all treasures added to the multiworld)
  * `the_great_cave_offensive_gold_thresholds` sets how much of the required gold amount is required for unlocking each individual area of The Great Cave Offensive

# Bug Fixes
* Fixed non-deterministic template yaml generation
* Fixed an issue where receiving treasures or copy abilities could corrupt certain parts of RAM
* Fixed an issue rendering generation incapable if required subgame count was greater than included subgames
* Fixed an issue where local Milky Way Wishes would not properly give credit for completed planets
* Fixed an issue where the wrong treasure would be granted when receiving a treasure from the multiworld
* Fixed an issue where the Nunchuks location in TGCO did not logically require a way to hit through walls
* Fixed an issue where Revenge of Meta Knight chapter checks did not have the correct logic
kss_0.0.2.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.0.2

kss_0.0.3.description:
# Features
* Added deathlink support.

# Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where receiving Dyna Blade - Extra 2 would cause game crashes
* Fixed an issue where TGCO doors would incorrectly calculate your gold amounts
* Fixed an issue where certain abilities would not be able to be regrabbed from ability stars/items
* Fixed an issue where players would be unable to quickswap in Milky Way Wishes under certain conditions
* Fixed an issue where the client would overwrite local Milky Way Wishes progression
kss_0.0.3.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.0.3

kss_0.0.4.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where only the first deathlink would ever trigger
* Fixed many issues revolving around Milky Way Wishes local progression
* Fixed an issue where players would be able to access MWW quickswap without any abilities, softlocking the game
* Fixed an issue where interacting with a Plasma pedestal while a Plasma ability item was spawned would crash the game
* Fixed spoiler writing for certain options
kss_0.0.4.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.0.4

kss_0.1.0.description:
# New Features
* 1-Ups, Maxim Tomatoes, and Invincibility Candy can each be individually added to the pool of locations.
  * Certain Maxim Tomatoes are not included as checks, such as those spawned by switches and those present in Gourmet Race.
* Copy Essences (outside of Milky Way Wishes) can be added to the pool of locations.
* A sound effect will now play when you receive an item.
* A second number will now be shown under your current gold in The Great Cave Offensive's HUD; this is the current gold threshold you need in order to progress to the next area.
* Information about the number of subgames required to goal as well as any specific subgames required have been added to the corkboard menu.
  * The stars between Dyna Blade and Megaton Punch shows specific subgame requirements from left to right:
    * Spring Breeze
    * Dyna Blade
    * Gourmet Race
    * The Great Cave Offensive
    * Revenge of Meta Knight
    * Milky Way Wishes
    * The Arena
  * The star and number between Milky Way Wishes and The Arena shows the number of subgames you are required to complete.
* Explicit support for Universal Tracker, including the ability to track without the yaml.

# Bug Fixes
* Invincibility Candies received from the multiworld now apply their effect.
* Invincibility Candy and Maxim Tomatoes can now be received in The Arena
* Fixed broken option validation

# Other Changes
* Paint and Cook are now considered Useful, and do not contribute to logic
* Credit for completion of Milky Way Wishes is now given at the start of the credits, and goal will be sent if it has been met.
* The credits theme will now play on the corkboard screen upon reaching your goal.
kss_0.1.0.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.0

kss_0.1.1.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed Sub-Tree 1-Up (2) not requiring a method to cut the rope
* Fixed a client error present on the 0.6.2 RC
* Fixed UT believing there to be no rules on any consumables/essences
kss_0.1.1.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.1

kss_0.1.2.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed UT support
* Fixed an issue where clients could time out while trying to read consumable information
kss_0.1.2.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.2

kss_0.1.3.description:
# Features
* Kirby palettes can now be edited
```yaml
  kirby_flavor_preset: bubblegum # Either in one fell swoop

  kirby_flavor_preset: # Or individually by (most) Copy Ability
    Fire: cherry
    Ice: blueberry
    Kirby: miku
    Plasma: lime
    Cutter: custom
```
Note: current presets and the default custom preset are copy-pasted from KDL3 without further adjustments. These will be adjusted in later updates.

# Bug Fixes
* `Garden - 1-Up (Starfall)` is no longer considered a Copy Essence

# Other Changes
* Many locations were renamed with more descriptive names thanks to Talcerase
* `the_great_cave_offensive_gold_thresholds` was changed to an OptionCounter. **This is a breaking change. All prior yamls will need their thresholds adjusted to account for this.**
kss_0.1.3.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.3

kss_0.1.4.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed the default yaml not generating
  * As a result of this, weighting and random are now properly supported
* Fixed all palettes being shifted 1, such that the first color in the palette was never read.
* Mitigate against an issue where TGCO gold would be set to max
* General world cleanup
kss_0.1.4.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.4

kss_0.1.5.description:
# Features
* Dyna Blade stages are now shuffled into the pool. Access to the first Dyna Blade stage is granted when the subgame is unlocked, while the rest are received as `Dyna Blade - Progressive Stage`.
* Arena Maxim Tomatoes are now considered a separate consumable group as regular Maxim Tomatoes and can be enabled separately.

# Other Changes
* Missing checks are now added:
  * "RoMK Chapter 3 - 1-Up (Wall)
  * "Garden - Maxim Tomato (Above Water)"
* Added manifest

# Bug Fixes
* Attempting to enter an area transition in The Great Cave Offensive when under the required gold amount no longer puts Kirby out of bounds
* Fixed Aqualiss cannon 1-Up and underwater 1-Up rules being swapped
* Fixed an issue where receiving only single-use copy abilities would cause a softlock in Milky Way Wishes when trying to quick swap.
* Fixed an issue where "Crystal - Maxim Tomato (Before Truth Mirror)" would not send
kss_0.1.5.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.5

kss_0.1.6.description:
# Bug Fixes
* The treasure chest and Deluxe essence in the how-to-play tutorials no longer send checks.
* Dyna Blade rules are now being properly set

# Other Changes
* Additional changes for tracker support
* Messages sent from DeathLinks now change depending on what subgame is currently being played.
kss_0.1.6.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.6

kss_0.1.7.description:
# New Features
* `kirby_flavor` has been replaced with `kirby_flavors`, which allows you to define your own presets which can be referenced in `kirby_flavor_preset`.
* `kirby_flavor_preset` can now take in a set of 1/2 colors and attempt to generate a palette from those two colors.

# Other Changes
* Crash/Sleep/Mike/Paint/Cook can now get unique colors
* Underwater sprites for copy abilities now are recolored

# Bug Fixes
* Fixed Dyna Blade Extra stages not requiring access to their prerequisite stages
* Fixed Revenge of Meta Knight not being allowed as a starting subgame
* Crash and Mike are no longer logically considered for The Arena
* The `Copy Ability` item group was split into two: `Copy Ability` and `Single Use Copy Ability`
* Some missing logic rules in TGCO were fixed:
  * Crystal - Dud can be gotten with Bomb
  * Old Tower - Unicorn's Horn can be gotten with Parasol
kss_0.1.7.title: Kirby Super Star APWorld v0.1.7
